name: [WiP] [vanilla javascript] Solitaire / Klondike clone
description:
THERE IS A FOOTER WITH MAGICAL BUTTONS.
(you can only click the cards. i did not add drag'n'drop yet)

it's all done in javascript, css and html. no external dependencies. all from scratch :D

if you want to win a game without a hassle use this seed: 41842338 (press reset game)

the in dev version is located here: https://gottz.de/twitch/qazijam9/game/

this does not use graphics. all you see are html elements styled with css.

whats missing:

  • draggable cards (right now you can only click them)
  • end game animation

but meh.. thats fine so far. if you play it you'll notice some effort and stylish css 3d effects :D
